definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: bitumen, asphalt (fr. I. [[חמר]] acc. to OBlau:ZMG 1869, 279, bitumen as seething, swelling up; Thes MV, fr. IV. [[חמר]], with ref. to reddish-brown colour)—[[חֵמָר]] Ge 11:3 + 2 t.; used for cement in building Babel Ge 11:3 (J); abounding in vale of Siddim ´[[בֶּאֱרׂת בֶּאֱרׂת ח]] Ge 14:10; used in coating Moses’ ‘ark’ of bulrushes Ex 2:3 (E; ‖[[זׇ֑פֶת]]).
